name: Farmers Stealing Tanks
description:
Steal a Tank that has run out of fuel and bring it back to your shed. WASD or Arrow keys to control your Tractor.

Drink Nemiroff to double your speed for 10 seconds. Destroy other tanks by ramming them with a stolen tank to get a free life.

❤️ Please donate to Ukrainian orphans at www.oasukraine.org ❤️ Thank you!

One week game inspired by true events

UPDATE: First in new and popular on itch. Article in Poland's national news agency. Tweet by anonymous. 5.8 million views on imgur. 39 thousand upvotes on reddit. I hope the orphanage wakes to a nice surprise. Proud of you all!
